line.text: No Time thou shalt not boast that I do change
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy pyramids built up with newer might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To me are nothing novel nothing strange
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They are but dressings Of a former sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Our dates are brief and therefore we admire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What thou dost foist upon us that is old
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And rather make them born to our desire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than think that we before have heard them told
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy registers and thee I both defy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Not wondring at the present nor the past
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thy records and what we see doth lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Made more or less by thy continual haste
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This I do vow and this shall ever be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I will be true despite thy scythe and thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
